description: The file is a shell script designed for self-healing connectivity tests on a router or similar device. It includes functions for performing ping tests, DNS resolution checks, and device resets, controlling the flow based on syscfg settings.

methods.name: getCorrectiveActionState
methods.description: Retrieves the current state of the corrective action setting from syscfg.

methods.name: calcRandTimetoStartPing
methods.description: Calculates a random delay before starting ping tests to stagger execution.

methods.name: resetRouter
methods.description: Triggers a device reboot via dmcli command.

methods.name: resetNeeded
methods.description: Performs reset if a specified process requires it, currently used for PING process.

methods.name: runDNSPingTest
methods.description: Performs DNS resolution test and initiates corrective action if DNS resolution fails.

methods.name: runPingTest
methods.description: Performs ICMP ping tests to the default gateway and triggers reset upon failure.
